Title: Establishes a commission to study and report on the potential implementation of staggered work start and end times for state workers to alleviate traffic congestion during rush hours
Summary: Establishes a commission to study and report on the potential implementation of staggered work start and end times for a percentage of state workers to alleviate traffic congestion on the New York state thruway and Adirondack northway during peak commuter travel times.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to establishing a commission to study and report on the potential implementation of staggered work start and end times for state workers to alleviate traffic congestion during peak commuter travel times; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
